snippet: Two units of the former Lehman Brothers Holdings company said they had settled litigation over $38 billion in asset claims by customers.
abstract: Two units of the former Lehman Brothers Holdings company announce that they have settled litigation over $38 billion in asset claims by customers.
lead_paragraph: Two units of the former Lehman Brothers Holdings company said they had settled litigation over $38 billion in asset claims by customers.

headline.main: Lehman Units Settle $38 Billion in Asset Claims
headline.print_headline: Lehman Units Settle $38 Billion In Asset Claims
